title: E-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Instructional Design Competency Building with Critical Flexibility

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze underlying assumptions and values in instructional design.
Learners can demonstrate flexibility in adapting and integrating theoretical approaches to specific educational contexts.
Learners can develop reflective practice strategies to bridge the gap between theory and practice.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
